title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: Do you find yourself scratching your head trying to understand the mind-boggling technology behind some of these blockchains? Worry not, as AdLunam's Co-Founder, Nadja Bester, is coming on the Crypto Altruism podcast to discuss how AdLunam is democratising early-stage crypto investing and how you can succeed in the world of Web3.Join them this Monday, August 1, 2022 on CryptoA Altruism Podcast!

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: When thinking about the crypto market, launchpads arenâ€™t usually the first thing that comes to mind. However, they play a big role in the market, attracting investors as well as helping new projects come to life. As the crypto market has been through major highs and lows over the recent years, launchpads are a new way to keep the market thriving. One of the best launchpads to do this is AdLunam.Launchpads have played an important role in the crypto market by encouraging new projects to be created. AdLunam is one of the best launchpads in the market, and its key feature is its NFT integrated model. They allows project creators to customise their presale by having the choice of what type of pricing they want (eg, dynamic or static), adding bonuses for users, and more. This is encouraging for project creators and inspires more people to start their own project and become a contender in the market.Learn more about them here: adlunam.cc
